text: Another day, another make - out session for Scott Disick. Kourtney Kardashian ’ s ex has attended the Club Revolve party on Saturday night, and he was accompanied by a mystery girl who was later confirmed to be Emma Blanchard. According to a source, the couple has arrived at the exclusive party in the same SUV around midnight. Scott and Emma were seen openly making out while sipping on cocktails. ‘ At one point, Scott and Emma slipped into a room behind a curtain to get more privacy, ’ the source said. The couple left the party together at 3 a. m. A second source said the hookup is nothing serious. ‘ Scott is not looking for a relationship. He is just enjoying his summer and having fun while flirting and hooking up with some ladies. Nothing is serious
